title: Blood that Ties, Blood that Binds
description: Walk with Shaylee ~ the lost Fey Princess who lost. With no memory of her childhood. Events lead to her finding out the truth, being married to a vampire dark lord, and caught in the midst of a predestined path set by Elders of three realms. Who is against her? Who is with her? Who thinks to destroy her? The dark forces are using the old magic to fight to take over Shaylee and throw off the balance that her light and presence brings. How will she ever get back to normal? How will she ever forgive? How will the love of the Twin Flames ~ Kailen and Shaylee ever survive?
author: Valarie Sizemore
